name: Nabil
wishText: Happy birthday to my dearest love, Nabil Syazani! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you, sayang. Another year with me babyy, yeayy. Hope you like it ˙ᵕ˙. I wish for you all the happiness, success, and love in the world because you deserve nothing less. May this year be filled with dreams realized, and countless moments of joy. I hope you feel as loved and cherished as you make me feel every single day.  I want to let baby know, I love you so much baby. From the moment you walked into my life, everything changed for the better. Your love, kindness, and laughter fill my days with endless joy and warmth. You are my greatest supporter, and I am beyond grateful for every single moment we share together. Thank you for being you and for loving me so deeply. I can't wait to create even more beautiful memories together and to see what amazing things the future holds for us. And I'm sorry for all my wrongdoing towards you and I know it's hard to handle someone like me, but I hope you can bare with it ദ്ദി ༎ຶ‿༎ຶ ). Anyways, babyyyyy!!!!! this is your second birthday celebration with me, hihi (˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶). Hopefully you will like it this year. So, let's have celebration together. I send you email for the details, kindly check your email after you read it (˵ •̀ ᴗ - ˵ ) ✧
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. Whatsapp me okay baby after you finish this ( ๑ ˃̵ᴗ˂̵)و ♡, if not I will (¬`‸´¬) ( -_•)▄︻テحكـ━一💥 piu~ piu~. Mwah my baby asyam ( ˶˘ ³˘(⋆❛ ہ ❛⋆)!♡
